name: 往け！往け！マグロ - THE SHOOTING MAGURO
name_original: 往け！往け！マグロ - THE SHOOTING MAGURO
description:
The MAGURO will go, as far as it will go.

Overview

You're a MAGURO, so swim the best swim in the world to reach your goal!
There are six stages in all! Speed and control are required!
Anybody who gets in the way, give him your signature MAGURO shot!

No Remaining-lives System!

There is life system in this game, but there are no remaining-lives.However, there is a penalty for continuing.
If you do too much continuity, you'll be a "sluggard".

Beware of oxygen and stamina!

Not only will MAGURO suffocate if they don't swim, but they won't be able to breathe in time even if they are swimming sluggishly.
However, if you keep swimming at high speed, you will lose your stamina. In such cases, let's eat sushi. Sushi is a great food for restoring stamina.
There are also air bubbles and oxygen tanks to help you breathe, so take advantage of them and reach your goal in one piece.
When push comes to shove, you'll have to...


Steam ranking support. Let's compete with MAGURO from around the world!

Tested Gamepad

Nintendo SwitchPro Controller
